      • correctAnswer

        public void correctAnswer(java.lang.String answer)
        This method runs when the user has answered correctly. It plays a celebrating song and colors the good answer's button green.
        Specified by:
        correctAnswer in interface GameReferee.GameRefereeListener
        Parameters:
        answer - The player's current answer.

      • wrongAnswer

        public void wrongAnswer(java.lang.String correctAnswer,
                        java.lang.String wrongAnswer)
        This method runs when the user has not answered correctly. It plays and annoying song and color the good answer's button green and the wrong answer's button red.
        Specified by:
        wrongAnswer in interface GameReferee.GameRefereeListener
        Parameters:
        correctAnswer - The good answer to the current question.
        wrongAnswer - The wrong answer to the current question, which the player has chosen.
